posts.subject: Kikes ready to take conrol of Zeronet.
posts.body:
New development:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1569600536_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di/ZeroNet+active+users+developers+roll+call

Recently situation:

ZeroTalk: http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1568735040_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di/KxoID+needs+your+help

One anon discovered in folder /data/filters of Krixano zite http://127.0.0.1:43110/kxonet.bit/?/create-id three files: anti_jew.json, anti_lgbt.json, license_offending.json.

Contents of files:
_________________________________
anti_jew.json

"mutes": {
        "1CeWedJ7nyWLbL1bCT6zsZU23fAnqEsi9h": {
            "cert_user_id": "homosexuality@zeroid.bit",
            "date_added": 1557090333876,
            "source": "ZeroMe",
            "reason": "Anti-Jew Hate Speech"
        },
        "15tQJFZZ7KVYMX6XPUkcs138LcgDQ2zVcL": {
            "cert_user_id": "realjohndoe@zeroid.bit",
            "date_added": 1557090333876,
            "source": "ZeroMe",
            "reason": "Anti-Jew Hate Speech"
__________________________________
anti_lgbt.json

 "mutes": {
        "1CeWedJ7nyWLbL1bCT6zsZU23fAnqEsi9h": {
            "cert_user_id": "homosexuality@zeroid.bit",
            "date_added": 1530012685,
            "source": "ZeroMe",
            "reason": "Homophobic Hate Speech"
____________________________________llicense_offending.json

    "siteblocks": {
    },
    "notices": {
        "1Bc3UjaDEQ7DVdDR4Uy7DRAPmUcY3pHQm9": {
            "date_added": 1,
            "name": "",
            "cloneof": "1MiS3ud9JogSQpd1QVmM6ETHRmk5RgJn6E",
            "offending_license": "MIT",
            "reason": "Copyright Notice not included."
____________________________________
Some jewcenter (gitcenter) quotes:

"Looks like you don't understand how ZeroNet works."
"The code that registers (KxoID) users is in 0background.py, and yes, that one can be controlled by Krixano (or those who have the keys, right, e.g. me). "
"That's right, plugins can be unsafe."
"You are quite paranoid, aren't you?"
"Hey, look! Krixano just created a literally empty blocklist, he might add users there and force others to use it! "
"I mean, there's literally no reason not to believe Krixano, and if I was to choose between Krixano (a person I know) and nofish (an abstract developer and someone I slightly don't understand), I'd choose Krixano actually."
"Hey, don't think of Krixano that bad. I mean, Krixano at least has some views and shows them, while nofish is just a shady person that tends to be away from his project."

From reaction thread http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1568749254_14kTJXu4KZSoWSSNcGtXEijf4NqEGimc9J/KxoID+and+why+GitCenter+is+cancer+KxoID+hate+thread 

jewcenter: "The blocklists were moved to KxoBlock."



Now jewcenter actions makes more sense:

-constantly writing about incompetent nofish development
-his need for coloboration in Zeronet development
-pushing his plugins
-his tor zeroid registration attack

He colect bunch of kikes to bring "democracy" to 0net.
